original: Please Enter Key (Press ESC to Delete Shortcut)
context: 请输入按键（按ESC删除快捷键）

original: Conflicts with the key {0} ({1}), clicking OK will delete the shortcut key of {0}
context: 与【{0}】({1})按键冲突，点击确定将会删除【{0}】的快捷键

original: Do you want to keep the changes?
Quickly switch between stealth, combat, and skip scenes
context: 快速切换潜行、战斗、跳过剧情

original: Batch Buy, Sell, Appraise【Item quantity must be 5 or more】
context: 批量购买、出售、鉴定【物品数量需满足5个】

original: Game continues to run in the background
When moving with the mouse, the default movement mode is running
context: 使用鼠标移动时，默认移动方式为跑

original: When moving with shortcut keys, the default movement mode is running
context: 使用快捷键移动时，默认移动方式为跑
使用消耗品时需再次确认

original: Batch use available for some consumables
context: 使用部分消耗品时可批量使用

original: Automatically start combat after battle opens
context: 战斗开启后默认开启自动战斗

original: 2x speed is the default after battle opens
context: 战斗开启后默认开启2倍速

original: MP, Rage continuously displayed after battle opens
context: 战斗开启后内力、怒气持续显示

original: HP continuously displayed after battle opens
context: 战斗开启后生命持续显示

original: One-click buy in order from high to low grade
context: 一键购买根据品级由高到低的顺序进行购买

original: One-click sell in order from low to high grade
context: 一键出售根据品级由低到高的顺序进行出售

original: Open auto-save (only saves when switching scenes and after battles)
context: 开启自动存档（仅切换场景和战斗结算时存档）

original: Save every 10 minutes in free state (requires auto-save to be enabled)
context: 自由状态下每10分钟进行一次存档（需要开启自动存档才能选择）
